title: How to Make Freezer Meatballs

steps.headline: Shape into 48 meatballs about 1 3/4-inches in diameter.
Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C) and bake, if planning to serve the meatballs immediately.
To freeze: Place 12 meatballs in a single layer on freezer wrap.
steps.description: Allow enough extra wrap to fold over top.

steps.headline: Fold freezer wrap over top and seal.
To serve frozen meatballs: Remove freezer wrap and place meatballs in shallow baking pan.
steps.description: Bake 1 hour at 350 °F (177 °C) or until the meatballs test done.

steps.headline: Recipe makes 24 servings of 2 meatballs each.

text: Mix all ingredients together.  Shape into 48 meatballs about 1 3/4-inches in diameter.  Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C) and bake, if planning to serve the meatballs immediately.  To freeze: Place 12 meatballs in a single layer on freezer wrap. Allow enough extra wrap to fold over top. Fold freezer wrap over top and seal. Label. Freeze immediately. To serve frozen meatballs: Remove freezer wrap and place meatballs in shallow baking pan. Bake 1 hour at 350 °F (177 °C) or until the meatballs test done. Recipe makes 24 servings of 2 meatballs each.  Serve meatballs with favorite sauce.
